verses.roman:
ihāṅi rahena sabe, vāsā--nānā-sthāne
ihāṅi pāibā tumi sabāra darśane"

synonyms: ihāṅi—here; rahena sabe—all of them are living; vāsā—their residential places; nānā-sthāne—in various quarters; ihāṅi—here; pāibā—will get; tumi—you; sabāra darśane—everyone's audience.
translation: "At present they are all living here. Their residences are in various quarters. Here you will get the audience of them all."
